      protected int ticTacs

  • Constructor Details

    • CellularAutomata

      public CellularAutomata()
      Constructor for CellularAutomata class. Creates a new grid of cells and initializes them to null. Also, it creates some predefined items in the grid.

  • Method Details

    • getLength

      public int getLength()
      Returns the length of the grid.
      Returns:
      the length of the grid

    • getItem

      public domain.Item getItem(int r, int c)
      Returns the item at a specific location in the grid.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index of the item
      c - the column index of the item
      Returns:
      the item at the specified location

    • setItem

      public void setItem(int r, int c, domain.Item e)
      Sets the item at a specific location in the grid.
      Parameters:
      r - the row index of the item
      c - the column index of the item
      e - the item to be set at the specified location

    • someItems

      public void someItems()
      Creates some predefined items in the grid.

    • ticTac

      public void ticTac()
      Advances the state of the grid by one time step. Calls the decide() and change() methods of each item in the grid. Also, updates the age of some items and randomly creates new items.
